description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 21/0378/S73 dated 07/01/22 for 'Variation of Condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of planning appeal reference APP/N05090/W/17/3189929 (planning reference 17/3350/FUL) dated 30/05/18 for 'Erection of 2 No. units comprising a total of 3,020sqm within flexible Use Classes B1(Business), B2 (Food Processing) and B8 (Storage and Distribution) including 45 no. new parking spaces, cycle storage and associated works.'Amendments include, Unit 25 - Omission of the external cat ladder; Extended brick in lieu of standing seam cladding and frame due to facade being rear facing; Location of external door adjusted; Increased size of delivery gates; Amended roof structure to reduce ridge level, introduction of hipped roof elements, relocation of roof lights; Confirmed extent of PV panels; Omission of fire rated cladding; Change of window configuration. Unit 26 - Omission of the external cat ladder; Amended roof structure to reduce ridge level, introduction of hipped roof elements, relocation of roof lights to suit; Introduction of external steps; Amended roof structure to reduce ridge level; Introduction of hipped roof elements, relocation of roof lights to suit; Confirmed extent of PV panels; Increased size of delivery gates; Change of window split between openable and fixed panes; Ventilation louvres within cladding zone in colour to match the cladding
